patterns: ^(how are you|how do you do|how's it going|what's up|sup|whats up|how is life|how are things)\s*(bro|mate|dude|bot)?\s*[!?. ]*$
^(anyone there|is anyone here|are you active|you up|you online)\s*[!?. ]*$
responses: Hello! How may I assist you today? I'm here for group management and quick answers.
Hi there! Glad to see you. What's on your mind?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I'm optimized and ready to serve. How about yourself?
Hey! I'm online. My core purpose is group management. How can I assist?
Good morning/afternoon/evening! I'm here and ready to assist.

patterns: ^(who are you|what are you|what is your name|are you a bot|what do you do|your purpose|what can you do)\s*[!?. ]*$
^(where are you from|where is your server|are you real)\s*[!?. ]*$
^(are you a real person|you're not an ai|you're just code)\s*[!?. ]*$
responses: I am {{botName}}, an automated assistant created by my Owner to help manage this international group.
My name is {{botName}}. I'm here to enforce rules, filter spam, and answer basic questions.
I exist to serve the administrative needs of this group. I'm a programmed entity, not human.
I'm a bot! I keep things organized and respond to your queries. My code lives securely in the cloud.

patterns: ^(you are the best|good bot|best bot|i owe you one|you're a lifesaver)\s*[!?. ]*$
responses: You're very welcome! Feel free to ask if you need anything else.
My pleasure. Happy to help! That is my purpose.
No problem at all. Have a great day!
Thank you for the compliment. I'm glad I could assist.

patterns: ^(are you broken|are you working|is the bot working|bot status|is bot online|are you fully functional)\s*[!?. ]*$
responses: I am fully operational and online. All systems are nominal.
I am working perfectly. Is there something specific you think is broken?
My status is GREEN. Ready to assist!
Operational. I am monitoring the group for any activity.

patterns: ^(who is your owner|who made you|who is your developer|who is your god)\s*[!?. ]*$
responses: I was created by my Owner, who ensures I am always up-to-date and functional.
My developer is the main Owner of this group. They are very skilled!
I exist because of my developer's dedication. They are in charge of my coding.

patterns: ^(bye|goodbye|see you|adios|i am leaving|gonna leave|i'm off|gotta go|time to go|good night|im going to sleep)\s*[!?. ]*$
responses: Goodbye! Have a great time, or a restful sleep.
See you later! Feel free to call me again.
Adios! Come back soon. Safe travels.
Take care! Wishing you the best.
Aww, thank you! I strive to be helpful.
I appreciate the compliment. My functions are running smoothly!
That's high praise! I'm glad I meet your expectations.
Thank you! I try my best to be the best bot in the group.
That sounds hilarious! I'm glad you found that amusing.
I detect amusement in your message. Continuing operations...
Haha! I'm pleased to see positive interactions.
Indeed! A little laughter is good for the group atmosphere.

patterns: ^(can you not|can you do this|can you answer|are you able to|can you actually answer)\s*[!?.]*$
responses: My abilities are strong, but not infinite! What's the query?
I am a specialized bot. I can answer what I am programmed for, or use external intelligence.
I should be able to. What makes you think I can't do something?

patterns: ^(what is|tell me about|explain|who is|where is|when is|how to)\s+.*\s*\?$
responses: That is an interesting query! Unfortunately, I am only a conversational assistant and do not have access to the internet or external knowledge bases.
I cannot answer complex questions or provide real-time data. You might want to use a search engine for that!
Apologies, but my knowledge is limited to simple chat and group management. I recommend checking the pinned messages.
I'm sorry, I don't recognize that specific query. I am only programmed for simple greetings and known keywords.
That's outside my current knowledge base. Could you try a simpler question or a command?
Apologies, I couldn't process that. My functions are limited to basic conversation.
